posts.post_content:
I have 3 t206's in my museum (eBay) and will sell them here for these prices:
Johnson glove showing Old Mill $500
Speaker $125
Lajoie throwing $85

eBay name is plbstew.  I will cover shipping, you cover PayPal fees.  I will pull any of my listings if they sell here, but if it already had a bid on eBay, I have to let the auction run its course.

Thanks,
Paul
